Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 5: Regret Reveals Opportunity
Description:
The fifth chapter of Your Best Year Ever focuses on the transformative power of gratitude and how it can positively impact goal achievement and personal growth.

Reminder that this is the fifth chapter in Michael Hyatt's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the next month, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
